analysis.description:
SaleWallet.doWithdraw (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#117-118) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! multisig.send(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#117-118)

Reentrancy in AragonTokenSale.doPayment (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#1207-1236):
	External calls:
	- ! token.generateTokens(_owner,boughtTokens) (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#1228-1229)
	External calls sending eth:
	- ! saleWallet.send(msg.value) (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#1225-1226)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalCollected (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#1234)

MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#211-212) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#308-343)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#428-450)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#524-539)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#546-562)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#622-638) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#355-374):
	External calls:
	- ! Controller(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount) (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#370-372)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#372)
SafeMath.assert (function @ /unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#58-64) shadows built-in symbol "assert"

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#592) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#480-481)

MiniMeIrrevocableVestedToken.calculateVestedTokens.vestedTokens (local variable @ /unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#880-889) shadows:
	- MiniMeIrrevocableVestedToken.vestedTokens (function @ /unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#846-856)

Reentrancy in AragonTokenSale.doFinalizeSale (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#1271-1304):
	External calls:
	- aragonTokens = token.totalSupply() * 3 / 7 (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#1290-1291)
	- ! token.generateTokens(aragonDevMultisig,aragonTokens) (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#1291-1294)
	- token.changeController(networkPlaceholder) (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#1294-1295)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- saleFinalized (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#1298-1299)
	- saleStopped (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#1303)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#622-638)
	- /unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#633-637
MiniMeToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ceb0d54a7e87dfa16ddf7656858cf7e29851fd7.sol#181)
